layout.singingstanza: In noth -- ing be anx -- ious, But in ev -- ery -- thing, By prayer and pe -- ti -- tion With thanks -- giv -- ing, Let your re -- quests, let your re -- quests Be made known to God; God; And the peace of God, Which sur -- pass -- es Ev -- ery man's un -- der -- stand -- ing, Will guard your hearts Will guard your thoughts In Christ Je -- sus.
